alert.note: Alert for Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Park; Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 09 at 4:15AM PDT until September 09 at 12:00PM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PDT TODAY FOR ISOLATED DRY THUNDERSTORMS COMBINED WITH DRY FUELS FOR PORTIONS OF INTERIOR MONTEREY COUNTY AND SAN BENITO COUNTY... The National Weather Service in San Francisco has issued a Red Flag Warning for Fire Weather Zone 517 Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest and Fire Weather Zone 518 Mountains of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County including Pinnacles National Park, which is in effect until noon PDT today. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 517 Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest and Fire Weather Zone 518 Mountains of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County including Pinnacles National Park. * TIMING...Until noon today. * WINDS...Northwest 10 to 15 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent, recovering into the 20s above about 2500 feet, and into the 40-50% range below 2500 feet. * TEMPERATURES...Afternoon highs in the mid-80s to lower 90s. * LIGHTNING...Isolated dry thunderstorms with isolated lightning strikes through noon today. Any thunderstorms that do develop are likely to remain dry at lower levels. * IMPACTS...The combination of dry fuels and lightning presents an increased likelihood of fire starts. Any starts that may occur are likely to remain isolated, given that winds and humidity remain below Red Flag criteria.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Park; Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest
